price: kemudian kepala mereka jadi tertunduk 964 (lalu berkata), "Sesungguhnya kamu (hai Ibrāhīm) telah mengetahui bahwa berhala-berhala itu tidak dapat berbicara."
arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُواْ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ
footnotes: 964.  Maksudnya, mereka kembali membangkang setelah sadar.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: thumma nukisū ʿalā ruūsihim laqad ʿalim'ta mā hāulāi yanṭiqūna
